name: Oats and Cream Soap
description:
Pamper your skin with our soothing and moisturizing goats milk soap infused with raw oats. Raw Oats will absorb and remove excess oil and bacteria from your skin and exfoliate dead skin cells, thus helping to combat acne. It enhances wound healing and shallow abrasions and improves collagen deposition and activation of immune cells within the skin.

Ingredients:sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, glycerin, water, sorbitol(moisturizer), fresh ground oats, organic goats milk, titanium dioxide(natural colorant) and fragrance.

name: Lip Butter
description:
Sister's Keeper Products lip butter is a  rich, buttery lip balm that melts on the lips to soothe and condition lips.  This rich butter leaves lips deeply moisturized, supple, and soft. 

Directions: Apply generously all over the lips.

Ingredients: avocado butter, palm butter and olive oil

name: Aloe Kiss Hair Mist
description:
A light mist designed to soften, moisturize, fight frizz and make hair manageable. This 8 oz mist is sure to be a staple to your regimen.



Ingredients:distilled water, aloe vera juice, panthenol, avocado oil, polysorbate 80, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid and fragrance.

name: Mango Moisture Milk
description:
Our rich and lightweight moisturizer will have your kinks and curls feeling rejuvenated. If your hair is low porosity, our Mango Moisture Milk is a must have and it doubles as a great de-tangler.

Porosity - It is a measure of how easily water and other substances can enter and exit the hair strand. 
Low porosity -  Your hair doesn't absorb products/water as easily.
High porosity -  Strands are capable of soaking up drastically higher amounts of water/product.

Ingredients:distilled water, mango butter, cannabis sativa seed oil, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, sodium stearoyl lactylate, stearic acid, sweet orange oil EO, coconut oil, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid and fragrance as an option.

name: Totally Twisted Styling Custard
description:
Defines your natural coils and curls while also giving you lasting hold. If you need an alternative to drying gels our Totally Twisted Styling Custard is for you. Scent is ripe raspberries with a touch of vanilla.


Ingredients: distilled water, burdock root, nettle leaf, aloe vera extract, sodium carbomer, hibiscus, olive oil, tetrasodium EDTA, natural preservative and fragrance oil.

name: Revitalizing Hair Tea
description:
A natural organic rinse of specially selected herbs to nurture your hair and scalp.

Directions: Add 3 tablespoons of the conditioning hair tea to your reusable tea bag per cup of water and let it steep until room temperature.  Pour rinse over your hair and scalp after shampooing.  For the best results, catch your hair rinse in a bowl as you pour it over your hair. Then repeat the rinse several times.  A final rinse with cool water is optional. This product can be used on all hair types.

Every hair tea includes 2 reusable tea bags

Ingredients: horsetail, nettle leaf, burdock root, hibiscus petals, licorice root and rosemary.

name: Cocoa Honey Deep Conditioner
description:
Sister's Keeper Cocoa Honey deep conditioner provides moisture and restores damaged hair.  Directions: Apply to clean wet hair for healthy conditioning and cover with plastic cap and allow to penetrate for 20-30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly, moisturize and style as usual.
 
Ingredients: distilled water infused with marshmallow root and burdock root, behentrimonium methosulfate, cocoa butter, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, sodium stearoyl lactylate, olive oil, avocado oil, honeyquat, aloe vera juice, hydrolyzed wheat protein, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid and fragrance as an option.

name: Peach Delight Bar
description:
Sister's Keeper Peach Delight Bar is made with goat milk to help nourish and revitalize dehydrated skin. The scent is of juicy peaches  freshly picked from a peach tree.


Ingredients: sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, glycerin, water, sorbitol (moisturizer), organic goats milk, titanium dioxide (natural colorant) and fragrance.

name: Ocean Sunset
description:
Honey and Goat's Milk are blended to make a soap that is ideal if not perfect for your skin. Honey is a humectant which means it attracts moisture to itself and is antimicrobial. Honey alone was used to treat scrapes and various bacterial infections throughout the years. Goat milk contains over 50 nutrients, minerals, acids and enzymes that help nourish and revitalize dehydrated skin. Can you imagine how awesome this soap will be to use on your skin? This bar of awesomeness can also be used as a shaving bar.  The scent is a luxurious and sultry blend of amber and myrrh with cozy sandalwood and patchouli and spice-berry in the top note. 

Ingredients: Sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, glycerin, water, sorbitol, goat's milk, honey and natural colorant.

name: Twilight Activated Charcoal Soap
description:
Sister's Keeper new handmade Twilight Activated Charcoal Soap uses activated charcoal that is known for its ability to detoxify, cleanse, deodorize, and many other beneficial properties. Not only helps to remove impurities and rejuvenate your skin, it adds a decorative touch to your bathroom as well. The active, charcoal goes deep to draw out would be pore-cloggers and remove blockages that breed unwanted bacteria that creates bumps, breakouts and acne. If effectively cleanses and unclogs pores, removing impurities and dead skin from the top layer of the skin leaving your skin supple, delicate and smooth. 

We describe this as a sexy scent with base notes of white carnation, blood orange, sandalwood, black rose, smoky wood, and a hint of patchouli. Top notes of toasted vanilla bean, whiffs of vetiver, amber, and the tiniest touch of Egyptian musk for a smoky, sexy finish.  This is a big hit with the husbands and boyfriends!

Ingredients: sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, glycerin, water, sorbitol (moisturizer), goats milk, activated charcoal powder, titanium dioxide (natural colorant) and fragrance.

name: Organic Black Soap Shampoo & Bodywash
description:
This amazing organic shampoo & bodywash is friendly to your skin, friendly to the environment, and friendly to the people of the world. It is all natural with no harmful chemicals, pore clogging preservatives, or artificial fragrances. African Black Soap works excellent for eczema, acne, dry skin, psoriasis and blemishes. African black soap can be used on your face, body and hair.  

Note: ARTIFICIAL BLACK SOAP is hard. It is dyed black. It  does not contain any traditional ingredients. Loaded with cheap vegetable oil. Stains your wash cloth. They are chemically processed.

Ingredients: distilled water, plantain skin, palm kernel oil, palm oil, cocoa pod ash, coconut oil, honey and a natural preservative.

name: Hair Repairing Shampoo Bar
description:
Hair Repairing Shampoo & Body Bar - Infused with Hydrolyzed Oat Protein. This protein aids in moisture retention, improved skin hydration, and enhances hair softness, texture and manageability. It is also an effective natural conditioning for both the hair and skin.

Ingredients - coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, vegetable glycerin , goat’s milk, purified water, sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), hydrolyzed oat protein, soy bean protein (conditioner) and a natural colorant

name: Rhassoul Clay Shampoo Bar
description:
Rhassoul Clay Shampoo Bar is widely recommended for helping improve the appearance of skin troubled by eczema, psoriasis, acne and rosacea. Rhassoul Clay brings a deep luster to hair which has been dyed with henna, improving the depth of color.
Ingredients - coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, vegetable glycerin , goat’s milk, purified water, rhassoul clay, sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), soy bean protein (conditioner) and a natural colorant

name: Stimulating Shampoo Bar
description:
Stimulating Shampoo Bar is infused with rosemary, eucalyptus and neem Oil.

Ingredients - coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, vegetable glycerin , honey, purified water, sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), rosemary essential oil, eucalyptus essential oil, neem oil,and soy bean protein and natural colorant

name: Penetrating Hair & Body Glaze
description:
Sister's Keeper Product's Penetrating Hair & Body Glaze is a super rich blend of oils that nourishes and softens hair and skin. This oil works great as a bath oil, sealing moisture in your hair, adding luster to your locs, aids in dry and itchy scalp, keeping your skin moisturized, and is great for protective styling and as a massage oil. 

Benefits of Sister's Keeper hair & body Glaze:
 
 ~contains high amounts of nutrients beneficial for the 
    skin like vitamin A and E
 ~preventing loss of moisture from the skin
 ~preventing loss of moisture from hair
 ~stimulating skin cells
 ~reducing & preventing split ends 
 ~restoring nutrient content to skin cells

Ingredients: hazelnut oil, avocado oil, rice bran oil, grape seed oil, sesame seed oil, olive oil, neem oil and fragrance oil (optional).

name: Sister's Keeper Sunburst Shampoo Bar
description:
Sister's Keeper created this 5 oz shampoo bar using honey, shea butter, coconut oil, mustard seed oil and neem oil. Honey is known for many benefits when it comes to hair. Honey works as a conditioning agent, adds shine and luster, retains moisture and also has incredible healing properties which makes it great for your skin, scalp and hair. Shea butter is naturally high in Vitamins A, E, and F, which helps to rejuvenate the skin and soften dry or damaged hair. Mustard seed oil helps stimulate the scalp to promote hair growth, and is a good source of vitamins and nutrients, which help nourish your scalp. Neem oil promotes hair growth by conditioning, nourishing and treating your hair and scalp. It prevents premature graying, excess shedding and hair loss and has antifungal, antiviral, antiseptic and antibacterial properties. The fragrance is a luscious blend of juicy mandarin, white peach and tropical mango.
Our Sunburst Shampoo bars will be a great staple to add to your regimen to keep your hair and skin healthy and glowing!!

Directions: Rub the shampoo bar onto wet hair, massage vigorously to produce lather. Rinse well and repeat.

Shampoo bars can be used on the body as well.

Ingredients - coconut oil, palm oil, safflower oil, vegetable glycerin, purified water, honey, shea butter, mustard seed oil, sorbitol (moisturizer), sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), neem oil, soy bean protein (conditioner) and fragrance.

name: Happy Hair Leave-In Conditioner
description:
Light, leave-in conditioner formulated with mango butter and coconut milk to hydrate hair and improve softness and elasticity.

Directions: Apply to wet, freshly cleansed hair. Smooth through hair from root to tip and style. This is the perfect base for any of our other products or for use by itself. 
Fragrance options are a light banana split scent or unscented


Ingredients: distilled water infused with ginger root, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, sodium stearoyl lactylate, slippery elm, panthenol, coconut milk, behentrimonium methosulfate, mango butter, horsetail, hibiscus powder, olive oil, avocado oil, pumpkin seed oil, neem oil, optiphen and fragrance as an option.

name: Naturally Thick Earrings
description: Naturally Thick earrings are must haves for every jewelry collection! These light weight hand crafted earrings are hypo allergenic.  The earrings are 3 inches.

name: Naturally Fine Like My Hair Tees
description:
We are all about embracing yourself naturally!! Rock your Naturally Fine like My Hair Tee with pride! **Sizes run on the small side, if in doubt, select one size up**

T-shirts larger than 2x have a 7 to 10 business day turn around.

name: Naturally Thick Like My Hair Tees
description:
Rock your natural & your curves with pride! Naturally Thick Like My Hair Tee is a white short sleeve v neck tee with magenta lettering. This is one sexy & sassy tee! **Sizes run on the small side, if in doubt, select one size up**

T-shirts larger than 2x have a 7 to 10 business day turn around.

name: Detangling Tools
description:
These tools are suitable for all hair textures and lengths including curly, thick, straight and long hair. 

De-tangling brush with flexible rows, gently loosen even the toughest tangles.

name: Natural Essentials Kit
description:
This Natural Essential Kit includes some of the most important items for any natural. 

~Satin Bonnet - Protecting your hair against breakage is definitely going to be the key to maintaining length and moisture. These also come in handy to wear underneath hats and scarves that are not made of silk or satin.

~Spray Bottle (8oz) - It's the purest form of moisture. Dipping your head over the sink or having to get in the shower to wet your hair will get old. 

~Wide Tooth Comb - Combing will aid in de-tangling

~Organic African Black Soap (4oz) - African black soap can be used on your face, body and hair.

~DIP Hair & Body Moisturizer (4oz) - Naturally curly, coily, kinky hair is prone to dryness and needs added moisture to maintain health, retain length, and limit breakage.

~So Chic' Hair Butter (4oz) - This blend of brazillian nut butter, unrefined shea butter, castor oil and an essential oils works as a sealant to seal moisture into your hair.

name: Signature Fragrances for Her & Him
description:
Women: Candy Kisses radiates sensuality. Top notes of passion fruit, melon, middle notes of jasmine and violet. This fragrance will leave you feeling exotic.

Men: Ego is part of you that separates itself from the outside world.  Earthy, citrus notes touched by the aromatic expressions of mint julep, amber and the sharp bite of Clary Sage without losing its sophistication.

name: SunShine's Favorite Things
description:
Hey Curls! It's SunShine from SunShine's Natural & Loving It! You just have to try out my favorite things from Sister's Keeper. My blemishes have nearly disappeared using the African Black Soap, my curls are so luscious thanks to the "DIP", and my skin is oh so soft thanks to the Dream Whip Body Butter! I would like to personally thank SK for such amazing products that have helped me along my journey!
 
In the 4oz set all items are 4 ounces.
In the 8oz set, all items are 8 oz including the Organic African Black Soap.

name: Shipping Insurance
description:
FOR DELIVERY TO U.S.A. ADDRESSES ONLY - If you would like to insure your order - please purchase here for $2 or signature confirmation for $4.75. 

Although the U. S. Postal Services are great, things sometimes go missing. Please consider insuring your order, as we can't be held responsible if orders do go astray in the mail, that aren't insured.

(Insured items are insured with USPS at the time of mailing - any claims for damage or loss are made against USPS, and can only be paid out upon receipt of reimbursement from USPS, once their investigations are completed. This can, unfortunately, take quite some time especially for non-USA shipments !).

name: Dip Hair & Body Moisturizer
description:
Our Dip Hair & Body Moisturizer naturally enhances hydration while calming and soothing dry skin.  Dip is enhanced with essential herbs that help moisturize and penetrate the hair and skin. It is suitable for all hair and skin types, but works best for those with high porosity hair. Dip can also be used as a leave in conditioner.

Porosity - It is a measure of how easily water and other substances can enter and exit the hair strand. 
Low porosity -  Your hair doesn't absorb products/water as easily.
High porosity -  Strands are capable of soaking up drastically higher amounts of water/product.

Ingredients: distilled water infused with burdock root & nettle leaf, behentrimonium methosulfate, slippery elm, panthenol, hemp seed butter, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, sodium stearoyl lactylate, honeyquat, coconut oil, hazelnut oil, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, sorbic acid and fragrance as an option.


Customer Reviews:

"I just wanted to let you wonderful ladies know how much I enjoy your DIP...I use it in not only in my hair but also in my two daughters ages 13 and 7 years...I was shopping with my mother today and a woman stopped me to say how beautiful she thought my hair was!! I've gotten so many compliments and I love the scent (We use vanilla)...I tried it after reading SunShine's Natural & Loving It posts about it and how she uses it daily...Continue to making this amazing product because I don't want anything else in these curls!! Stay Blessed!!" - Tisha S.

"Your DIP Moisturizer has totally revitalized my hair I absolutely love it. Thank You!!!" - Lawanda C.

name: Sister's Keeper Sampler
description:
The Deluxe Sample Set* includes one of each that is listed below. This is a great option for those that want to experience how Sister's Keeper products can enhance your skin and hair using all natural ingredients. Each item is 2oz.

Items included in the sampler are:

So Chic Hair Butter
Dip Hair & Body Moisturizer
Dream Whip Body Butter
Happy Hair Leave In Conditioner
Sunburst Shampoo & Body Bar
Our Deluxe Sample Set now comes in six different scent sets. 

Deluxe Sample Set 1
 Unscented 

Deluxe Sample Set 2
 Fruity Scents (Cherry, Passion fruit, grape, apple, etc.)

Deluxe Sample Set 3
 Bakery scents (Key Lime Pie, Pecan Caramel Crunch, etc)

Deluxe Sample Set 4
 Unisex scents (Karma Sutra, Frankincense etc) 


*All items are 2 ounce sizes

name: Goats Milk Soap
description:
Goat milk contains over 50 nutrients, minerals, acids and enzymes that help nourish and revitalize dehydrated skin.  Modern science has discovered that goat milk soap has a pH level similar to healthy human skin and hair. 

Ingredients: sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, glycerin, water, sorbitol (moisturizer), organic goats milk, titanium dioxide (natural colorant) and fragrance.

"Kiki and Nikki, I love love LOVE the goat's milk soap bar! My skin is no longer dry or itchy and my eczema is clearing up, I'm a lifer baby! Thank you so much!" Princess Kristii W.

name: Miracle Elixir Hair Oil
description:
Sister's Keeper Miracle Elixir contains a blend of rosemary oil and wheat germ oil which is known to increasing circulation of blood flow to the scalp and stimulate hair follicles. It's also known to restore hair and assist in the hair being flexible so it has high-shine. It's perfect as a pre-poo, hot oil treatment or as a sealant. 

Ingredients: hazelnut oil, castor oil, wheat germ oil, rosemary essential oil, eucalyptus essential oil and grapefruit seed oil.

name: So Chic Hair Butter
description:
So Chic Hair Butter is an amazing blend of butters, essential oils, emollients and humectants, that will leave your hair with plenty of shine. So Chic hair butter works best when applied to wet or damp hair.  This hair butter also works when applied to dry hair and for maintaining your locs.

Ingredients: Brazilian nut butter, unrefined shea butter, essential oil blend, vegetable glycerin, castor oil and fragrance oil as an option.

"I am sooo pleased with the So Chic Hair Butter. My daughter decided to shampoo her own hair this morning (she's 11) without me being prepared to style it when she finished. I got out of bed and noticed her hair was wet, and got an instant attitude. I was NOT prepared to do hair right then. I knew that her hair needed to be managed right away, or else she and I would be crying when I finished. I don't like heat on our hair, so that made it a challenge to manage as well. I remembered that I had just purchased the hair butter and thought this would be the perfect time to test it out. I detangled and bantu knotted my daughter's hair within an hour!!! That is unheard of for us :D Her hair is moisturized without being greasy and it shines! Needless to say, I will be purchasing the large size very soon of So Chic Hair Butter. Thank you ♥ " - Cortnei M.

name: Raw Organic African Black Soap
description:
This amazing organic raw soap is friendly to your skin, friendly to the environment, and friendly to the people of the world. This soap is hand pressed by an African Co- Op of women in a small village in Ghana. It is all natural with no harmful chemicals, pore clogging preservatives, or artificial fragrances. ﻿Our 4oz bars are used to shampoo hair as well as cleanse our skin.  African Black Soap works excellent for eczema, acne, dry skin, psoriasis and blemishes. African black soap can be used on your face, body and hair. This soap easily doubles as a makeup remover. One 4 ounce bar of black soap can last for several weeks at a time.

Note: ARTIFICIAL BLACK SOAP is hard. It is dyed black. It  does not contain any traditional ingredients. Loaded with cheap vegetable oil. Stains your wash cloth. They are chemically processed.

Ingredients: plantain skin, palm kernel oil, palm oil, cocoa pod ash, coconut oil, and honey.


"Just received my order of black soap today. First of all, I'm so happy with the fast shipping and packaging! I can tell that a lot of love went into preparing that product for me. Secondly, this is my first time using black soap. I just washed my face with it and I have to say that it feels DIVINE! My face has never felt so clean! I'm so excited to see the results that regular usage will bring! Thanks so much!!!!! :-)" - Rachel D.

name: Exfoliating Brown Sugar Body Scrub
description:
This natural body scrub is made with coconut oil which absorbs quickly and easily into your skin, leaving it moisturized and protected without feeling greasy.  Brown sugar crystals exfoliate dead skin cells while sweet almond and rice bran oil oils condition, nurture and smooth your skin to perfection. The extra fine coarse salt has a detoxifying effect on the skin.

How to use:  Apply to wet skin or dry skin, rubbing in circular motions and paying extra attention to rough areas of skin like elbows and knees. Rinse thoroughly. 

Ingredients: Brown sugar, extra fine dead sea salt, rice bran oil, almond oil, coconut oil, castor oil and wheat germ oil, fragrance and natural preservative.

Always use caution when using soaps, bath additives and oils in body scrubs as they can make the tub slippery.

name: Coco Body Mousse
description:
Coco Body Mousse replenishes the skin’s lipid barrier to help hold in moisture while softening dry and chafed skin.﻿ Its a rich creamy dessert made for your hair and body. This is a non greasy natural formula that will lock in your skin's moisture and provide a nice glow. If you are looking to lock the moisture in your hair, this product is what you have been looking for and the chocolate scent is amazing.

Ingredients: Soy butter, cocoa butter, castor oil, safflower oil, almond oil and fragrance oils.

name: Dream Whip Body Butter ﻿
description:
Our hand whipped gourmet body butter melts onto your skin instantly. Dream Whip Body butter contains enriched vitamins, moisturizing and nourishing ingredients from all natural sources. Treat your skin with this delectable blend of butters. Formulated with rich oils to seal moisture into dry skin, this butter blend is rich in antioxidants and loaded with anti-aging properties. Apply after showering to lock in  moisture. Aids in skin conditions such as; psoriasis, eczema, dermatitis, rashes, calluses, stretch marks, shingles, sunburn, and dry cracked skin.﻿

Ingredients: unrefined shea butter, mango butter, macadamia nut oil, apricot kernal oil, grapeseed oil and fragrance oil as an option.﻿

"I absolutely LaLaLove the Dream Whip Body Butter ♥!!" - DeAndra B.

name: Sister's Keeper Gift Certificates
description: An E-Gift Card is a fast, fun way to make someone's day. You choose the amount and message. They'll receive your personalized email within 24 hours - redeemable for whatever they desire in our online store!
